summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness in an amount not to exceed $60.72 against the Lighting Fund of the City of Seattle on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of 2nd Avenue from Yesler Way to Virginia Street, by the installation of a system of cluster lights, as provided for in Ordinance No. 15607, creating Local Improvement District No. 1444.
